meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by staphylococci.
meanings.sent1: The staphylococcic infection required immediate treatment.
meanings.sent2: Doctors identified the staphylococcic bacteria in the patient's wound.
meanings.sent3: The staphylococcic bacteria threw a party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: The staphylococcic presence in the hospital spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The staphylococcic nature of the bacteria made it highly contagious.

meanings.sent1: The researcher studied the staphylococcic characteristics of the bacteria.
meanings.sent2: The staphylococcic culture was growing rapidly in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The staphylococcic colony had a talent show on the agar plate.
meanings.sent4: The staphylococcic connection between the samples was evident.
meanings.sent5: The staphylococcic behavior of the cells puzzled the scientists.
